successes.title: Crypteks USB™ - Inspired Design meets Ultra-Security
successes.description: Super-secure your digital stash with the Crypteks USB™ featuring a customizable lock and world-class data encryption

Pledges.description: You are our hero! Every little bit counts and we really appreciate your help. All of our Kickstarter backers will receive a unique dub-step mix by Pressure and exclusive access to the Crypteks™ password management system.

Your pledge of $130 will land you a Crypteks USB™ 8GB and personally allow us to bring this unique product to market. U.S Shipping Included
(Canada add $10. International add $15)

Need a little more space? By pledging $160 you are ordering our current highest capacity Crypteks USB™ 16GB. We can't thank you enough! U.S Shipping Included.  
(Canada add $10. International add $15)

Special Edition in Black: As per Kickstarter backer request! We have worked tirelessly to make available a special edition Crypteks USB™ in black! By pledging $200 or more your are pre-ordering a Special Edition Black Crypteks USB™ 16GB. Thank you all for making this possible! U.S Shipping Included. (Canada add $10. International add $15)
Two's company! By pledging $315 you are ordering two Crypteks™ USB 16GB for you and a loved one! U.S Shipping Included. (Canada add $15. International add $20)

Best of both worlds! By pledging $355 you are ordering both a Silver Crypteks USB™ 16GB as well as our latest Special Edition Black Crypteks USB™ 16GB! U.S Shipping Included. (Canada add $15. International add $20)
Better in Black! By pledging $395 you are ordering two Special Edition Black Crypteks™ USB 16GB for you and a loved one! U.S Shipping Included. (Canada add $15. International add $20)

Official Sponsor Pledge: By pledging $777 or more you are sponsoring ingenuity and the dreams of many! You will be pre-ordering Five Crypteks™ USB 16GB for you and lots of your soon-to-be-VERY thankful friends! U.S Shipping Included. Your Name or Company Logo will be featured as an Officially Recognized Sponsor with a special dedication on our website and Mailing Lists! (Canada add 50$, International add $75)

Corporate Sponsor Pledge: Corporate sponsors pledging $1,500 or more will receive "Warm Fuzzies" "Infinite-forever OMG! gratitude" and of course 10 Crypteks™ USB 16GB in addition to specially dedicated Corporate Sponsor mentions on our website and Mailing Lists! U.S Shipping Included. Limited solely to Kickstarter backers. (Canada add $75. International add $100)

Enterprise Sponsor Pledge: Enterprise sponsors pledging $3,750 will receive 25 Crypteks™ USB 16GB individually numbered and laser inscribed. Enterprise sponsors will be featured on our website as "Brought to you by:" with custom graphics and animations. In addition to a private dedication, micro-sites will be designed in HTML5 outlining the company profile and full contact information linked directly from our website. We will also try our best to conjure magical rainbows and dancing unicorns in an attempt to show our deepest gratitude! U.S Shipping Included. Limited solely to Kickstarter backers. (Canada add $200. International add $350)
